titles.title: I will dance, I will sing

authors.author: Matt Redman Copyright Â© 1995 Kingsway's Thankyou Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will dance, I will sing
To be mad for my King
Nothing, Lord, is hindering
This passion in my soul.
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I'll become
Even more undignified than this.
Some may say it's foolishness, but
I'll become
Even more undignified than this,
Leave my pride by my side
La la la la la HEY
(repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: It's all for You, my Lord!
